error_unexpected_message: An unexpected error occurred on our end.
error_404_message: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
error_401_message: Sorry, you don't have permission to access this page.
error_403_message: Access to this resource is forbidden.
error_500_message: It's not you, it's us. We're working on fixing it.
error_503_message: Hang tight! You lost connection to the agent server! Check if the agent is running and try again.
error_client_message: There was a problem with your request.
error_page_description: An error occurred while trying to access the page. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
